<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Anadi Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1422)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Anadi hunters act as the eyes and ears of their people by scouting surrounding areas for potential invaders.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Anadi_AnadiHunter.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Anadi Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1422)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +9

**Languages**
[Anadi](/Languages.aspx?ID=46), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 27

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing plus anadi venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +9 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Anadi Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 15 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The anadi changes into their hybrid form, spider form, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in their hybrid form. While in their human form, the anadi hunter can't use their fangs attack and loses their climb Speed. When in spider form, they can't use weapons.

**Spin Silk**  ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. A single anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-107" />
name: Anadi Hunter
